entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 5:00 PM AST Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: E 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers or flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
